subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Chris Froome, who finished second to his teammate Bradley Wiggins last year, crossed the line first in Paris, becoming Britain’s second winner in cycling’s premier race.
snippet: Chris Froome, who finished second to his teammate Bradley Wiggins last year, crossed the line first in Paris, becoming Britain’s second winner in cycling’s premier race.
